channel.title: Latest Chess News, Chess Info, Sports News Updates - NDTVSports.com
channel.description: Latest Chess news, info, breaking news updates from around the cricketing world. From long on to long off, drives, hooks, pulls, cuts, yorkers and doosra, Sports.NDTV.com is an all-rounder in World Chess coverage. View best photos and videos.

item.title: Norway Chess: Viswanathan Anand Beats Aryan Tari In Final Round, Finishes Third
item.description: Former world champion Viswanathan Anand scored a win over Aryan Tari in the ninth and final round to finish third in the Norway Chess tournament which was won by world number one Magnus Carlsen

item.title: Norway Chess: Viswanathan Anand Loses To Shakhriyar Mamedyarov As Magnus Carlsen Surges Ahead
item.description: Viswanathan Anand, who was in second spot behind world No.1 Carlsen after seven rounds, slipped to third with 13 points at the conclusion of the eighth and penultimate round
